nodes.text: The Empire Strikes Back - The Film Novel

The Empire Strikes Back - The Film Novel (French: L'Empire contre-attaque - Le roman du film) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. The Empire Strikes Back - The Film Novel was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on September 9, 2015.

Luke Skywalker and his friends have won the Battle of Yavin, but the Star Wars has only just begun - the Empire has not had its last word and wants to strike hard. The Lord Darth Vader does everything to find the young Jedi and heads to Hoth, the Ice Planet, where the Rebels are hiding. This new battle promises to be complicated once again…
